mapper.select: INSERT INTO MAPPING (SURVEY_SEQ, RATER_ID, APPRAISEE_ID, SURVEY_COMPLETE_YN) SELECT SURVEY_SEQ, RATER, APPRAISEE, 'N' FROM( SELECT SURVEY_SEQ, RATER, APPRAISEE, 'N', ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY RATER ORDER BY RATER) AS NUM FROM( SELECT S.SURVEY_SEQ, R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AS RATER, A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AS APPRAISEE, 'N' FROM SURVEY_LIST S, PROJECT_HISTORY R, PROJECT_HISTORY A, PROJECT P, USER_INFO I WHERE R.PROJECT_ID = A.PROJECT_ID AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID != A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND I.EMPLOYEE_ID = A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND I.GRADE_ID = 2 AND A.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID AND P.PROJECT_CLOSED_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -(30 * #{month}) , 'YYYY-MM-dd') AND S.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) ) WHERE NUM <= #{number}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAPPING WHERE SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq}

SELECT P.PROJECT_ID, UR.GRADE_ID, UA.DEPARTMENT_ID, M.SURVEY_SEQ, M.RATER_ID, M.APPRAISEE_ID, S.SURVEY_NAME, O.DEPARTMENT_NAME, UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS "raterName", UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS "appraiseeName", G.GRADE_NAME FROM PROJECT P, PROJECT_HISTORY H, GRADE G, MAPPING M, USER_INFO UA, USER_INFO UR, SURVEY_LIST S, ORGANIZATION_CHART O WHERE P.PROJECT_ID = H.PROJECT_ID AND UR.GRADE_ID = G.GRADE_ID AND H.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID = M.APPRAISEE_ID AND UA.EMPLOYEE_ID = M.APPRAISEE_ID AND UA.DEPARTMENT_ID = O.DEPARTMENT_ID AND UR.EMPLOYEE_ID = M.RATER_ID AND M.SURVEY_SEQ = S.SURVEY_SEQ AND M.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} ORDER BY G.GRADE_ID DESC, UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME

SELECT A.PROJECT_ID, UR.GRADE_ID, UA.DEPARTMENT_ID, S.SURVEY_SEQ , UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AS "raterId", UA.EMPLOYEE_ID AS "appraiseeId", S.SURVEY_NAME, O.DEPARTMENT_NAME, UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS "raterName", UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS "appraiseeName" FROM SURVEY_LIST S, PROJECT_HISTORY R, PROJECT_HISTORY A, PROJECT P, ORGANIZATION_CHART O, USER_INFO UA, USER_INFO UR WHERE R.PROJECT_ID = A.PROJECT_ID AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID <> A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID = UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND R.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID AND UA.GRADE_ID = 2 AND UA.EMPLOYEE_ID = A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND UA.DEPARTMENT_ID = O.DEPARTMENT_ID AND P.PROJECT_CLOSED_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -(30 * #{month}) , 'YYYY-MM-dd') AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID = #{raterId} AND S.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM MAPPING M WHERE M.APPRAISEE_ID = UA.EMPLOYEE_ID AND M.RATER_ID = UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND M.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq}) ORDER BY UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAPPING (SURVEY_SEQ, RATER_ID, APPRAISEE_ID, SURVEY_COMPLETE_CHECK) VALUES (#{surveySeq}, #{raterId}, #{appraiseeId}, 'N')
